QuestData.Title: The Empress' Guard
QuestData.Description:
The Zara'thik are the empress' elite guard. Empowered with plundered Azerite, they will stop at nothing short of absolute conquest of all of Pandaria.
If we allow them to advance past the Serpent's spine, the Golden Lotus will be no match for them.
Stop them at the wall, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Zara'thik mantid in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
